meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the notochord.
meanings.sent1: The notochordal cells provide support for the developing embryo.
meanings.sent2: The notochordal tissue helps in the formation of the spine.
meanings.sent3: The notochordal jellyfish had a unique way of moving through the water.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and flexible as a notochordal structure.
meanings.sent5: The notochordal characteristics of the organism were evident under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Having the structure or function of a notochord.
meanings.sent1: The notochordal development in the fish was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The notochordal features of the animal allowed for graceful movement.
meanings.sent3: The notochordal bicycle had a surprisingly smooth ride.
meanings.sent4: His voice resonated with a notochordal strength that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The notochordal design of the bridge made it both sturdy and flexible.
